products.Name: Garlic-Lime-Shrimp
products.Description: Garlic-Lime-Shrimp is a delicious seafood dish that features succulent shrimp cooked in a zesty garlic-lime sauce.
Method: Add the shrimp to the bowl and toss to coat evenly. Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate for 30 minutes to marinate.
Preheat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Once hot
add the marinated shrimp and cook for 2-3 minutes per side
until pink and cooked through.
Remove the skillet from heat and transfer the cooked shrimp to a serving dish.
Garnish with chopped fresh cilantro

products.Name: Spring Roll Salad
products.Description: All the tastes, color and fun of a spring roll without all the work!
Method: Whisk peanut butter, oil, rice vinegar, maple syrup, tamari (or soy sauce), water, garlic and crushed red pepper (if using) in a small bowl until smooth.
Combine lettuce, shrimp, rice, cabbage, bell pepper, carrot, cucumber and avocado in a bowl. Add dressing and toss to combine. Garnish with mint and sesame seeds, if desired.

products.Name: Chicken Salad Tostadas
products.Description: Chicken Salad Tostadas is a delicious and easy-to-make Mexican-inspired dish that features crispy corn tortillas topped with a flavorful chicken salad.
Method: Prepare salad kit according to package directions, reserving tortilla strips and shredded cheese; fold in chicken. Divide the chicken salad mixture among tostada shells. Top with the reserved tortilla strips and cheese.

products.Name: Chicken Rice Bowl
products.Description: Juicy chicken chunks cooked in a blend of flavourful sauces and topped over boiled rice in a bowl. This recipe is super easy and can be made with just a handful of ingredients. It is ideal for a wholesome lunch or dinner meal.
Ingredients: 1/2 cup chopped frozen green pepper, thawed
1 package (9 ounces) ready-to-use grilled chicken breast strips
Method: Rice should be washed and soaked and the oil. Take the chicken and properly clean it.
Add oil in a pan. Chicken chunks and ginger-garlic paste should be added to it. Cook the chicken pieces for a little while.
Add the diced carrots, onions, and onions after that. Add pepper, lemon zest, red chilli sauce, and soy sauce next.
Mix in some salt after adding. Put the cooked rice in a bowl.

products.Name: Monkey Bread
products.Description: Store-bought fresh pizza dough forms the base for this elegant flatbread. It's easy as pie.
Method: Preheat oven to 450°F. Heat oil in a saucepan over medium. Add red onion and 1/4 teaspoon each of the kosher salt and pepper. Cook, stirring, until tender, 2 minutes.
Roll pizza dough into a 1/4-inch-thick, 17- x 11-inch rectangle. Place on a large baking sheet lined with parchment paper. Sprinkle with remaining 1/4 teaspoon each salt and pepper.

products.Name: Mutton Korma
products.Description: A flavourful mutton curry, where the meat is stirred with curd, garlic-ginger paste, cloves, cardamom and cinnamon sticks.
Ingredients: 1 kg boneless mutton, cut into bite-sized pieces
Method: Cook onions and spices, add mutton and spices, and simmer until tender.
Add yogurt and cook until heated through.
Garnish with fried onions and cilantro, and serve hot with naan or rice.

products.Name: Tandoori Lamb Chops
products.Description: Lamb chops marinated in strained yogurt and flavoursome masalas. Cooked till tender, this dish is guaranteed to impress
Ingredients: 2 lamb chops, trimmed of excess fat
Method: Marinate lamb chops in a mixture of yogurt, tandoori masala, lemon juice, vegetable oil, garlic, ginger, salt, and cayenne pepper
Grill or broil lamb chops for 4-5 minutes per side, or until cooked to desired doneness.
Serve hot with lemon wedges and fresh cilantro (optional). Enjoy your delicious Tandoori Lamb Chops!

products.Name: Malabar Fish Biryani
products.Description: This classic Malabar Fish Biryani can be devoured at all times. Enjoy the delicious taste of this ever-charming dish.
Method: Marinate fish with salt, sauté onions with biryani spice mix, add partially cooked fish to the pot.
Add soaked rice, water, and salt to the pot, cover and cook on low heat until rice and fish are fully cooked, about 20-25 minutes.
Let it rest for 5 minutes, garnish with cilantro and serve hot with raita or salad.

products.Name: Nihari Gosht
products.Description: A traditional Muslim dish, where the meat almost blends with the gravy.
Method: Fry onions and spices, add beef and cook until browned.
Add water or beef stock, cover and simmer on low heat for 2-3 hours until beef is tender and gravy is thick.
Thicken the gravy with a wheat flour or cornstarch slurry, garnish with cilantro and serve hot with lemon wedges and naan or rice

products.Name: Hyderabadi Keema
products.Description: This Hyderabadi mutton keema recipe accentuates the taste of keema and makes a mouth-watering masaledaar dish.
Method: Fry onions and ginger-garlic paste in oil until browned, add ground beef and sauté until browned.
Add spices and salt, mix well and cook for a few minutes.
Add chopped tomato and cook until soft and well combined. Garnish with cilantro and serve hot with naan or rice.

products.Name: Pancakes
products.Description: Pancakes are typically round and flat, with a slightly crispy exterior and a fluffy, soft interior.
Method: Mix pancake batter ingredients, pour onto heated pan, cook until golden brown on each side. Serve with desired toppings.

products.Name: Appam
products.Description: Appam is a traditional South Indian and Sri Lankan breakfast food
Method: Blend together rice, coconut milk, yeast, and sugar to make the batter, ferment overnight.
Cook the batter in a special appam pan until the edges are crispy and the center is soft and fluffy.

products.Name: Peanut Butter Oatmeal
products.Description: A tasty take on the classic oatmeal breakfast recipe, this one makes use of peanut butter to add that extra something.
Method: Boil water and salt in a saucepan
Add the oats and stir in
Cook for 4-5 minutes on medium flame
Transfer to a bowl and add peanut butter, cinnamon and honey

products.Name: Cereal Sundae
products.Description: A healthy quick breakfast receipe that kids just love it.
Method: Layer the ingredients on a platter
Order to follow - berries, yoghurt, and topped with cereal

products.Name: Spanish French Toast
products.Description: This is a great breakfast recipe for the days you will like being slightly fancy, but just as lazy
Method: Whisk the milk, eggs and cinnamon in a bowl
Dip both sides of a single slice in the egg mixture and fry till golden brown
Sprinkle with generous amounts of powdered sugar

products.Name: Roasted Vegetable Pasta
products.Description: This roasted vegetable pasta is one of our go-to weeknight easy dinner ideas!
Method: Whisk the milk, eggs and cinnamon in a bowl
Dip both sides of a single slice in the egg mixture and fry till golden brown
Sprinkle with generous amounts of powdered sugar
